text: Carlos Manuel Salgado Costa (born 8 November 1966) is a Portuguese football manager and a former player. He played 9 seasons and 282 games in the Primeira Liga for Farense and Beira-Mar. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Beira-Ma on 22 August 1993 in a game against Estoril. ==References== ==External links== Category:1966 births Category:Sportspeople from Coimbra Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:C.D. title: Carlos Costa (footballer)
